help: Click to add a point ; Control-click or Shift-click to remove a point. Share the address to share your build.

strength.label: Strength
strength.description: Increase the Attack of all Champions by {{{X}}}.

greater-strength.label: Greater Strength
greater-strength.description: Increase the Attack of all Champions by {{{X}}}%.

pierce.label: Pierce
pierce.description: Critical Hits from your Champions ignore an additional {{{X}}}% Armor.

courage.label: Courage
courage.description: Increase the Attack of all Champions by {{{X}}}% while they're below 50% Health.

lesser-precision.label: Lesser Precision
lesser-precision.description: Increase the Critical Rate of all Champions by {{{X}}}%.

lesser-cruelty.label: Lesser Cruelty
lesser-cruelty.description: Increase the Critical Damage of all Champions by {{{X}}}%.

extended-fury.label: Extended Fury
extended-fury.description: Increase the duration of Fury by {{{X}}} second(s).

precision.label: Precision
precision.description: Increase the Critical Rate of all Champions by {{{X}}}%.

cruelty.label: Cruelty
cruelty.description: Increase the Critical Damage of all Champions by {{{X}}}%.

enhanced-fury.label: Enhanced Fury
enhanced-fury.description: Increase the effectiveness of Fury by {{{X}}}%.

pure-skill.label: Pure Skill
pure-skill.description: With extensive field training, Skill Champions ignore an additional {{{X}}}% enemy Armor with Critical Hits.

mutagenesis.label: Mutagenesis
mutagenesis.description: Rapid mutagenesis closes Bleed wounds in your Mutant Champions {{{X}}} second(s) faster than non-Mutants.

glass-cannon.label: Glass Cannon
glass-cannon.description: Increase the Attack of all Champions by {{{X}}}%, but reduce their maximum Health by {{{X}}}%.

despair.label: Despair
despair.description: Debuffs applied to enemies reduce their healing and Regeneration effects by {{{X}}}% each.

recoil.label: Recoil
recoil.description: Increase Special Attack damage for all Champions by {{{X}}}%, but they sacrifice {{{Y}}}% Health for each activation.

deep-wounds.label: Deep Wounds
deep-wounds.description: Bleed your Champions inflict last {{{X}}}s longer. If they have more Health Points than their target, their Bleed instantly strikes down an additional {{{Y}}}% max Health from enemies.

unfazed.label: Unfazed
unfazed.description: When an enemy evades, your Champions have a {{{X}}}% chance to stack +{{{Y}}}% Critical Damage for their next Critical Hit and become Unstoppable for 1.0 second(s).

liquid-courage.label: Liquid Courage
liquid-courage.description: Increase the Attack of all Champions by {{{X}}}%, but they suffer an eternal Poison that drains 0.6% Health each second.

double-edge.label: Double Edge
double-edge.description: Increase the Attack of all Champions by {{{X}}}%, but up to {{{Y}}}% Health is lost by Bleeding over {{{Z}}} seconds.

assassin.label: Assassin
assassin.description: Against enemies below 18% Health, your Champions gain {{{X}}}% Attack and decrease enemies' defensive Ability Accuracy by {{{Y}}}%. If enemies start the fight below 18%, your Champions also gain 30% offensive Ability Accuracy.

vitality.label: Vitality
vitality.description: Increase the Health of all Champions by {{{X}}}.

greater-vitality.label: Greater Vitality
greater-vitality.description: Increase the Health of all Champions by {{{X}}}%.

salve.label: Salve
salve.description: Your Champions recover {{{X}}} Health twice per second for 60 seconds. No effect on robots.

block-proficiency.label: Block Proficiency
block-proficiency.description: Increase the Block Proficiency of your Champions by {{{X}}}%.

energy-resistance.label: Energy Resistance
energy-resistance.description: Increase Resistance against Energy damage by {{{X}}}% for all Champions.

recovery.label: Recovery
recovery.description: Increase any Health your Champions recover during a fight by {{{X}}}%.

perfect-block.label: Perfect Block
perfect-block.description: While Blocking, your Champions have a {{{X}}}% chance to perform a Perfect Block.

physical-resistance.label: Physical Resistance
physical-resistance.description: Increase Resistance against Physical damage by {{{X}}}% for all Champions.

stand-your-ground.label: Stand Your Ground
stand-your-ground.description: While Blocking, your Champions have a {{{X}}}% chance to resist a Block Break.

collar-tech.label: Collar Tech
collar-tech.description: Retrofit Tech Champions with a field that inhibits enemy Power Gain by {{{X}}}%.

serum-science.label: Serum Science
serum-science.description: Give Science Champions a Serum of +{{{X}}}% Energy Resistance.

willpower.label: Willpower
willpower.description: For each new type of detrimental effect your Champions suffer, they regenerate {{{X}}}% Health per second and gain +{{{Y}}} Armor until that effect expires. No effect on robots.

coagulate.label: Coagulate
coagulate.description: Your Champions take {{{X}}}% less damage from any Bleed effect they suffer.

inequity.label: Inequity
inequity.description: Decrease opponent's Attack by {{{X}}}% for each detrimental effect they suffer, up to a maximum of 36% reduction.

suture.label: Suture
suture.description: Reduce the duration of enemy Bleed effects by {{{X}}}%.

resonate.label: Resonate
resonate.description: Contact with Physical Attacks resonates in enemies, reducing their Attack by {{{X}}}% for 7 seconds.

wisdom.label: Wisdom
wisdom.description: Earn +{{{X}}} XP with all Summoner XP rewards.

limber.label: Limber
limber.description: Rigorous mental and physical training reduces the duration of enemy Stun effects by {{{X}}}%.

intelligence.label: Intelligence
intelligence.description: Increase all Summoner XP rewards by {{{X}}}%.

parry.label: Parry
parry.description: Timing a Block right when attacked reduces damage by {{{Y}}}%. If contact is made, Stun attackers for up to {{{X}}} second(s). Stun duration increases with Perfect Block Chance.

dexterity.label: Dexterity
dexterity.description: Evade all attacks while dodging back. Dodging an attack in this way grants +{{{X}}}% Critical Rate for your next attack.

stupefy.label: Stupefy
stupefy.description: When your Champions inflict Stun, it lasts for {{{X}}} additional second(s).

petrify.label: Petrify
petrify.description: When your Champions inflict Stun, they also reduce enemy Health and Power gains by up to {{{X}}}% for the duration of the Stun.

pittance.label: Pittance
pittance.description: Earn +{{{X}}} Gold with all Gold rewards.

pacify.label: Pacify
pacify.description: When your Champions inflict Stun, they also reduce enemy ability triggers by {{{X}}}% for the duration of the Stun.

cosmic-awareness.label: Cosmic Awareness
cosmic-awareness.description: Imbue Cosmic Champions with perception rivalling Heimdall, reducing enemy Armor Up effectiveness by {{{X}}}%.

mystic-dispersion.label: Mystic Dispersion
mystic-dispersion.description: Your Mystic Champions accrue {{{X}}}% Power each time an enemy beneficial effect expires.

detect-cosmic.label: Detect Cosmic
detect-cosmic.description: Reveal the hidden Class of Cosmic enemies up to {{{X}}} steps away on a Quest Map. This information is shared with allies.

detect-tech.label: Detect Tech
detect-tech.description: Reveal the hidden Class of Tech enemies up to {{{X}}} steps away on a Quest Map. This information is shared with allies.

detect-mystic.label: Detect Mystic
detect-mystic.description: Reveal the hidden Class of Mystic enemies up to {{{X}}} steps away on a Quest Map. This information is shared with allies.

scouter-lens.label: Scouter Lens
scouter-lens.description: Reveal the hidden Hero Rating and Star Rating of enemies up to {{{X}}} steps away on a Quest Map. This information is shared with allies.

detect-mutant.label: Detect Mutant
detect-mutant.description: Reveal the hidden Class of Mutant enemies up to {{{X}}} steps away on a Quest Map. This information is shared with allies.

detect-science.label: Detect Science
detect-science.description: Reveal the hidden Class of Science enemies up to {{{X}}} steps away on a Quest Map. This information is shared with allies.

detect-skill.label: Detect Skill
detect-skill.description: Reveal the hidden Class of Skill enemies up to {{{X}}} steps away on a Quest Map. This information is shared with allies.
